text: Except in cases of irreconcilable conflict, this chapter shall be construed to augment, and not to repeal, any other law of the District of Columbia authorizing another basis of jurisdiction or permitting another procedure for service in civil proceedings in the District of Columbia courts.

chapter.text: Civil Jurisdiction and Service Outside the District of Columbia. (Refs & Annos)
